user_query: a real estate agent I want to buy it I want us to buy that's a mighty big building to buy on the most expensive land in the city we get that building we'll be inside twelve and next time they'll think twice about refusing to make loans to us if we're their landlords what about the thrill of taking it to the man in his own castle no less you just be the face of our partnership I think I'm you know qualified for this we'll teach you everything you need to know don't you know any other white people who like to get paid to be out front man or not that I trust do you I don't trust white people how do you even go through life like that truth be told I don't trust black people either what are you even saying that no matter what there's always something extra going on in the relationship it's just the way is when you accept that you can't get caught off guard when it rears its ugly head I'll take that risk um you're at Matt's Diner right Hollywood High yes you're a few years ahead of me but I mean everybody knew who you were what are y'all sorry faced about will I be working with the investors hand in hand so they're hiring you kind of a partnership I'm in are you sure just teach me what I need to know I won't let you down you gotta learn how to talk to rich white folks so it seems like you want to and you got one month to learn how to play golf and I mean learn to play like you've been playing your whole life oh it looks like I got my ass swing lower great thanks keep your head
